scripts.test: npm run test:webpack & npm run test:scss & npm run test:internal-apps & npm run test:android
scripts.test:android: npm run build:android & chokidar 'www/**/*' -c 'npm run build:android'
scripts.test:web: npm run test:webpack & npm run test:scss & npm run test:internal-apps
scripts.build: npm run build:webpack && npm run build:scss && npm run build:internal-apps && npm run build:android
scripts.build:production: rm -rf android/app/src/main/assets/* && npx webpack --env production && sass --no-source-map --style=compressed src/styles.scss www/dist/styles.css && node build-internal-apps.js --production && npm run build:android
